ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: A Warning...
ygData.msgSnippet: He was wondering myself if I would be able to log in in about 15 min when I get home.  I hope this doesn t go away quietly in a few days.  I think what VI did
ygData.messageBody:
He was wondering myself if I would be able to log in in about 15 min when I
get home. I hope this doesn't go away quietly in a few days. I think what
VI did was cowardly, despicable, and probably illegal if ever held to the
legal fire.

I think it was more serious that Vault network is shutting down. I was
curious to hear a theory that Sony might buy out the Vault Network's parent
company to shut them down since they basically provide free advertising for
all of EQ's competitors. Awfully close to Black Helicopter stuff, but not
outside the realm of possibility.

Kit

The Rathe

From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

Date: Thu, 05 Oct 2000 14:12:22 -0500

>Sorry to interrupt your day with off-topic prattle, but I did want to
>address something important.
>Some of you may have heard already, but for those who didn't, a player on
>Brell Serilis (my current home server) was banned for a roleplay story she
>wrote and posted to a non-Sony affiliate board. Please don't respond with
>your "they deserved it" or "Verant should be bombed!" flames, I don't want
>to start a thread about it. If you're interested in the
>Basically what I wanted to do, as co-moderator of this list, was to warn
>you that anything you say can (and will, apparently) be held against you by

>Verant. This list is designed as a private list for subscriptions, etc,
>but is open to the public for archive reading. Consider this a word to the

>wise. I may even add this to the list FAQ :(
>
>Talies the Wanderer

with the subject submissions.
